name: 2D FoxJump
description:
Fox Jump is a jump & run game with varied levels. The player has the possibility to choose between different levels and has to avoid traps and enemies.

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions :)

The game took a really long time to get to this state. I have spent a lot of effort on it. I also wanted to try to create a tutorial that other people can see how it works as a developer.

-- Features: --
* different and varied levels
* a few small puzzles
* simple controls
* small Easter Eggs
* music and sound effects
* suitable for children and all ages
* different enemies / traps
* achievements
* collecting Gems
* constantly new content (with updates)

-- Planned Features: -- (currently paused)
* new and much more varied levels
* new enemies
* new soundtracks / music
* highscore list
* character customization
* balancing
* store for gems

-- Game description: --

* Move with AD
* jump by Space
* double jump by pressing the Space
* Collect Gems for cracking the respective level highscore
* Cherries can be eaten when the player has lost lives
* Enemies can be eliminated when the player jumps on the respective enemies
* enemies do damage to the player of course

FoxJump 2D is for Windows and after the pause for android available!

If you have bugs or suggestions you can still post them, I will try to fix them or add features.

For questions feel free to come on my Discord and write me personally (maxp@devnost.com) :)
